misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni, a celebrated figure in the Hector Trophée, brings a wealth of experience and a commanding presence to the greens. As the primary organizer of the Hector Trophée, his dedication extends far beyond his own performance, shaping the very fabric of the tournament.

Representing Hirsala Golf, Toni has participated in all 11 editions of the Hector Trophée, demonstrating remarkable consistency and commitment to the event. His efforts have culminated in securing the coveted Hector Trophée on three occasions. Furthermore, Toni's individual brilliance has shone brightly, earning him the Victor Trophy twice.
As Toni prepares for Hector Trophée 2025, anticipation builds around his 12th appearance. Known for his strategic mind and unwavering focus, Toni is undoubtedly a force to be reckoned with.
